pages.text: A long time no see that it. Great to have you back. I don't know where this journey will take me, but I thought it might be an interesting idea to keep some kind of special documentation in my <modpack>, while writing little tid bits I encounter during the development cycle.

pages.title: Update Announcement
pages.text: As you might have guessed I wasn't able to publish the update as promised yesterday, even though I spend another 10 hours non-stop grinding through my todo list. I guess it was just more then I had anticipated when I first starting working on the update. Everything that is left now to finish the next update are roughly

30 tweaks I need to make to different quests, to further streamline the nightmare mode experience. Then it's just porting over a few more pages from the old guide. I know that this  is a feature that almost nobody uses, but I still wanted to refactor it. But I won't finish the whole new guide, before the next update as that would take another week of work. So I'll only finish the Ore Generation

before publishing the next update. Depending on how much time I have tomorrow after work I might be able to get the update out by then, if not you can count on me that it'll be out by Friday. (for real this time) I promise when you'll see the changelog you can relate why this update took me around 120 hours of work, stretched over roughly 1.5 months. Besides fixing various bugs I encountered

during my own playthrough and some balancing on the endgame there a a few mods I changed to further increase the performance of the pack and I did some preparations, when I start working on versions beyond 2.3.x, where there will be some drastic changes to the current state of the pack, but more on that during another point of time. I want to finish

with thanking you for taking your time to check out my work and actually playing something I spend the majority of my freetime on. It just makes me happy to see that something I made is appreciated by others. Alright, time to get back to the update. Stay tuned.
